response.original_title: WSJ’s findings: a surge in illegal construction  Illegal Israeli Construction Is Surging Across West Bank Since Oct. 7
response.overview: "A Wall Street Journal investigation found that since Oct. 7, Israeli settlers have been rapidly building illegal roads and outposts across the West Bank. This work is sometimes done under armed guard with funding from the Israeli government."
response.title: WSJ’s findings: a surge in illegal construction  Illegal Israeli Construction Is Surging Across West Bank Since Oct. 7
